concept.title: Using an HBase User
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the destination to use an HBase user to write data to HBase. By default the HBase destination uses the user.

conbody.p: HBase destinationusing an HBase user to write to HBaseThe user is the user who started the . Or, when using Kerberos, the user is the Kerberos principal.

To use an HBase user, perform the following tasks:
On HBase, configure the user as a proxy user and authorize the user to impersonate the HBase user.
For more information, see the HBase documentation.
In the HBase destination, enter the HBase user name.
